name: Titanium.UI.Windows
summary: Windows Phone specific UI capabilities. All properties, methods and events in this namespace will only work on Windows or Windows Phone devices.

methods.name: createAppBarButton
methods.summary: Creates and returns an instance of a Titanium.UI.Windows.AppBarButton.

parameters.name: params
parameters.summary:
Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by <Titanium.UI.Windows.AppBarButton>
except those marked not-creation or read-only.

methods.name: createAppBarSeparator
methods.summary: Creates a separator for the command bar.

except those marked not-creation or read-only.
